subject: Email automation not triggering
description: Our email automation workflows are not triggering as scheduled. This is affecting our lead nurturing campaigns.

subject: Analytics dashboard loading slowly
description: The analytics dashboard takes over 30 seconds to load. This is impacting our daily reporting.

subject: Poor customer support response time
description: It takes too long to get responses from support. We need faster resolution times.

subject: Data export functionality broken
description: Cannot export campaign data to CSV. Getting error message when trying to download reports.

subject: Request for white-label options
description: Need white-label options for our client-facing campaigns. Current branding is too prominent.

subject: Performance issues during peak hours
description: System becomes very slow during business hours. Response times are unacceptable.

subject: Data backup issues
description: Cannot access our backup data. Need to restore from last week's backup.

subject: API integration failing
description: Our custom API integration is failing intermittently. This is critical for our daily operations.

subject: Feature limitations
description: The current feature set is too limited for our enterprise needs. We need more advanced capabilities.

subject: Login authentication errors
description: Multiple team members are experiencing login issues. This is blocking our work.
